programme.title: Western Kid
programme.desc: Andrea Balestri has dubbed himself Kid Terror O’Hara, leader of a group of children who head to the ghost town of Torque to play cowboy games.

programme.title: Cjamango
programme.desc: Just when Cjamango has won a bag of gold in a poker game, he is attacked by the gangs of El Tigre and Don Pablo.

programme.title: Taste of Killing
programme.desc: Dubious Bounty Killer Hank Fellows tracks bank stage coaches to observe them being robbed.

programme.title: A Coffin for the Sheriff
programme.desc: Spaghetti Western icon Anthony Steffen stars as Shenandoah, a mysterious man who joins a ruthless band of highwaymen after overcoming an almost impossible and death-defying initiation.

programme.title: I Am Sartana, Your Angel of Death
programme.desc: A bank that was thought to be impenetrable is robbed by a man wearing the trademark Sartana cloak. Our black-clad hero soon has a price on his head and must try to proof his innocence with the help of his shabby friend Buddy Ben.

programme.title: Watch Out Gringo! Sabata Will Return
programme.desc: After a daring gold robbery, bandit Carrancho double-crosses his gang and hides the loot in a grave. As ruthless outlaws and gunmen close in, the chase for the stolen treasure turns into a deadly showdown.

programme.title: Cry Blood Apache
programme.desc: Gang of sadistic cowboys let nothing stand in their way in their search for gold.

programme.title: Companeros!
programme.desc: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.

programme.title: There's a Noose Waiting for You Trinity!
programme.desc: Trinity is an ex-gunslinger desperately wanting to be forgiven and accepted by his family that he abandoned years earlier. Unfortunately for him, a ruthless bounty hunter is on his trail.

programme.title: Apache Fury
programme.desc: A judge encounters a man (Frank Latimore) he once wronged after an Apache attack. The attack forces him, his fiancée and their fellow stagecoach passengers to take refuge at a rest stop.

programme.title: Kill Django... Kill First
programme.desc: Johnny MaGee arrives in a mining town and clashes with banker Anthony Burton, who uses underhanded tactics to acquire gold mines. As Burton manipulates the locals, including offering to wipe out a doctor’s debts in exchange for his sister’s marriage, Johnny finds an ally in bounty hunter Ted. But Burton’s reach goes far beyond the mines.

programme.title: Savage Pampas
programme.desc: In the late 1800's, an army captain tries to tame the open plains of Argentina which are dominated by Indians and bandits. To help do this, the captain brings in a party of women to keep his soldiers happy.

programme.title: Shadow of Sartana
programme.desc: Sartana has a bounty on his head and he's wanted dead or alive. To eliminate this he makes a deal with the local politicians. If he hunts down the marauding Randal Brothers, the bounty will be removed.

programme.title: Pancho Villa
programme.desc: A double-cross in an arms deal prompts Mexican revolutionary Pancho Villa to raid a US Army weapons depot in Columbus, New Mexico.

programme.title: Trinity and Sartana Are Coming
programme.desc: Sartana and Trinity set out on a grudging relationship hell bent for gold and comic brawls.
